Articles.Content:
So, I've been watching the forums for a good while now, and played KSP for slightly longer (so I'm not exactly a newbie), but I think the time has come to finally say hello to the community and thanks to the developers for creating such a brilliant game!

I'm also an aviation fan, and had a lot of experience on X-Plane before playing KSP, and appreciate well made textures and terrain details (of which KSP has both!)

Finally, KSP has revived my inner 6-year old rocket-lover, who vanished after I rationalized my desire to become an astronaut into becoming a pilot... but then, maybe 6-year old me's dream could come true too someday, however unlikely that probably is!

Anyway, Thanks once again for the great game!

Jiggyb2

Hi jiggyb2, welcome to the community

I hope you have a lot of fun here on the forums and in KSP, now go launch some rockets

Thanks folks!

I've already had plenty of fun, hopefully I'll have much more in future!

Jiggyb2
